markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 325 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Alglenweis](/Deities.aspx?ID=605), [Kostchtchie](/Deities.aspx?ID=77), [Sithhud](/Deities.aspx?ID=438), [Weight Of The World](/Deities.aspx?ID=384)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Icy cold rushes forth from your hands. You deal 12d6 cold damage to creatures in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Cone of Cold

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />

<additional-info>

**Deities**

</summary>
summary: Bitter cold damages creatures in a cone.
summary_markdown: Bitter cold damages creatures in a cone.
text: Cone of Cold Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 325 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Alglenweis, Kostchtchie, Sithhud, Weight Of The World Cast somatic, verbal Area 60-foot cone Saving Throw basic Reflex --- Icy cold rushes forth from your hands. You deal 12d6 cold damage to creatures in the area. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
